it has check in, check out, you can check out an old version, roll back, what you want to do.

it's really quite easy.  after you install, the check in program is "ci" and the check out program is "co".
yes.  cvs or subversion adds things like merging multiple changes, updating your code to reflect other people's changes, etc.
